result.execSummary:
The defendant Allyxander M. Schmidkonz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Allyxander M. Schmidkonz is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Allyxander M. Schmidkonz was found guilty of Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

943.10(1m)(a) -Burglary of a Building or Dwelling, PTAC   943.20(1)(a) -Misd Theft, PTAC

Attorney Andrew Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney C Lassiter.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Court orders cash bond modified to $1,975.  Court orders restitution in the amount of $1,050 joint & several with 14CF583 (by stipulation of deft); $525 to be sent out to victim.  On State's motion, ct 1 is dismissed.  Deft pleads no contest.  Court withholds sentence and places deft on probation for 1 year w/conditions; pay $200 DNA surcharge; any remainder of bond to be returned to poster.  Expunction hearing set for 8/12/15 at 8:30am.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney C Lassiter.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Lassiter acknowledges receipt and waives reading.  Deft enters not guilty pleas.  DA PTC 7/18/14 at 1:30pm and FPT 7/22/14 at 8:45am.  Bond continued.
